Hi, @jack clarke, and welcome aboard!

 

By default, the debug menu is available to all players. I don't believe there is any way to turn this off.

However, depending on the competition, you might be able to have your students send their craft files to you, where you can grade them on your game (presumably free of cheats).

Edited July 15, 2017 by Dman979
Grading is grand!

There are several Windows companion apps that will swallow the Alt-F12 and prevent it from being used in KSP. NVidia GeForce Experience is one, if the machines have NVidia graphics.

I know there are other "hotkey" programs that do the same thing.

And the game has no console codes. All the cheats are displayed wide open in the debug menu.

 

Edited July 15, 2017 by bewing
